issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new mobile project in Studio
2. Launch in the 3.0 emulator

Actual results:
PANIC: Could not open: C:\Users\labuser\.android/avd/titanium_18_WXGA.ini

Expected results:
App is launched in the 3.0 simulator
fields.summary: Android : Build - v8, Rhino When launching to emulator 3.0 on Windows 7 a panic occurs and fails to launch to emulator
fields.environment:
Ti Studio 1.0.7.201112152014
Ti Mob SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111220190134
Windows 7

Android emulator 3.0

comments.body:
Unable to reproduce with recent master branch. I created and launched an app after setting the default android sdk to 3.0 in Studio preferences.

Desktop Platform: Windows 7 Ultimate, Service Pack 1.
Titanium Studio 1.0.8.201201262211.
Titanium Mobile SDK 1.9.0 (build hash 3c7830e)
closing as we are not able to reproduce using master (Feb 9 2012 09:46 rd47ce8a4)
